repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:18.04

WORKDIR /test
RUN apt update && \
    apt install --no-install-recommends -y python python-pip zsh && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
COPY ./tests/test_shell.sh /test/
RUN LC_ALL=C.UTF-8 LANG=C.UTF-8 pip --no-cache-dir install goto-cd

CMD ["zsh", "test_shell.sh"]
